mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TEST_RESULT_ANALYSIS (PAPER_ID, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_SCORE, QUESTION_CONTENT, RESULT_USER_ID, RESULT_IS_CORRECT, RESULT_ID) VALUES (#{testResultAnalysis.paperId}, (SELECT QUESTION_TYPE FROM T_QUESTION WHERE QUESTION_ID = #{testResultAnalysis.questionId}), #{testResultAnalysis.questionId}, (SELECT QUESTION_SCORE FROM T_QUESTION WHERE QUESTION_ID = #{testResultAnalysis.questionId}), (SELECT QUESTION_CONTENT FROM T_QUESTION WHERE QUESTION_ID = #{testResultAnalysis.questionId}), #{testResultAnalysis.resultUserId}, #{testResultAnalysis.resultIsCorrect}, #{testResultAnalysis.resultId})
